Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Waffle \Waffle\, n. [D. wafel. See {Wafer}.] 1. A thin cake baked and then rolled; a wafer. [1913 Webster]
2. A soft indented cake cooked in a waffle iron. [1913 Webster]
{Waffle iron}, an iron utensil or mold made in two parts shutting together, -- used for cooking waffles over a fire. [1913 Webster]
waffle n : pancake batter baked in a waffle iron v : pause or hold back in uncertainty or unwillingness; "Authorities hesitate to quote exact figures" [syn: {hesitate}, {waver}]
